content.subTitle: BUILT ON STELLAR DEX
content.title: Crypto Exchange Revolution!
content.description: We’re utilizing Stellar Blockchain and its DEX technology to provide highly secure, reliable and fast cryptocurrency exchange platform for traders.

wallet.title: Multicurrency Wallet
wallet.description: Keep your coins, tokens, fiat all in one wallet

swap.title: Instant Swap
swap.description: Exchange any currency instantly at the best price

dex.title: Built on DEX
dex.description: Take full advantage of the Stellar Blockchain

trade-info.title: Trade. Anywhere
trade-info.description:
Compatible with multiple devices, start trading with
safety and convenience

security.title: Comprehensive protection with security and law funds
security.subtitle: MAXIMUM SECURITY
security.description: Strade.io protects your funds with both centralized and decentralized methods. It is also the first exchange to invest millions in security and law funds to add extra protection for your assets.

deposit.title: Efficient trading and instant deposit / withdrawal
deposit.subtitle: EASY DEPOSIT
deposit.description: As an established exchange with cutting-edge technology, Strade.io offers an efficient and convenient trading system as well as an instant deposit and withdrawal service.

liquid.title: Take maximum profit of trading more than 30 assets
liquid.subtitle: HIGH LIQUIDITs
liquid.description: With a built in Artificial Intelligence market maker that meets the high standards set by Wall Street, our model analysis based on over 250 market parameters, providing 24/7 Customer Support and high liquidity.

support.title: Full assistance anytime You need
support.subtitle: 24/7 SUPPORT
support.description: We provide 24/7 online customer support to ensure quick and readily available support when needed.

augur.title: Augur (REP) Version 2 Upgrade
augur.description: Augur upgraded to the second version of its prediction market software on July 28th

filecoin.title: Filecoin [IOU] is now available for trading
filecoin.description: We’re excited to announce support for trading Filecoin [IOU] (XFIL) on Strade!

matic.title: Matic (MATIC) is now available on Strade
matic.description: We’re excited to welcome Matic (MATIC) to Strade! You can now deposit MATIC and trade
